body_html:
if you have multiple versions of CUDA installed, you probably need this instead:

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64

This is because /usr/local/cuda is usually just a symlink to one of the versions. if you have multiple versions, it may be a symlink to another version.
body:
if you have multiple versions of CUDA installed, you probably need this instead:
```
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$LD_LIBRARY_PATH:/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64
```
This is because `/usr/local/cuda` is usually just a symlink to one of the versions. if you have multiple versions, it may be a symlink to another version.
